setting.name: enableTimeout
setting.label: Enable time-out
setting.description: If enabled, the call will be automatically transfered back to the extension that parked the call once the time specified in Park timeout has elapsed.

setting.name: parkTimeout
setting.label: Park time-out
setting.description: Time period in seconds, after which the call is automatically transferred back to the extension that parked the call if time-out is enabled.

setting.name: multipleCalls
setting.label: Allow multiple calls
setting.description: If checked, more than one call can be parked on the orbit at the same time. Calls are retrieved in the order in which they were parked.

setting.name: allowTransfer
setting.label: Allow transfer
setting.description: If checked, callers put on park are able to transfer the call back to the extension that parked the call by pressing 0. You can configure a different transfer key in the advanced section.

setting.name: transferKey
setting.label: Transfer key
setting.description: Pressing the transfer key defined here will transfer the call back to the extension that parked the call. Allow transfer has to be enabled.
